name: Product Design Portfolio Template
description:
This 50+ slide keynote deck is the perfect place to start to nail that upcoming product design interview. The deck has dark and light versions, is fully customizable and adheres to my principles for a perfect portfolio presentation, as outlined in my Product Design Interview Training E-Book.


Download the keynote here.


Should you need additional help preparing for the interview process, I also:


  • Wrote a Product Design Interview Training E-Book
  • Created a Product Design Whiteboarding Interview Template
  • Offer 1:1 Product Design Interview Training
